thread.title: Loving Dog Instantly Protective Of Newborn Baby
thread.title_full: Loving Dog Instantly Protective Of Newborn Baby

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Loving Dog Instantly Protective Of Newborn Baby
text:
Loving Dog Instantly Protective Of Newborn Baby   
Marley the dog is instantly protective of her new “granddaughter” Reilly when she comes over to visit and her reaction takes her human family by surprise. 
She begins to whimper and gently lays her head on the baby as if protecting her. Grandma is right there to reassure and comfort Marley and the moment Reilly moves Marley, she seems calmer and not so worried. 
What an adorable, little protector! 
Share this sweet video with your friends and family!
